root.name: Star Wraith 3: Shadows of Orion
root.description: Despite the fact that Star Wraith is an old game, it is a very good example of an independent game that can compete with main-stream offerings. It is graphically Some of the environments have been featured in mainstream magazines. superior to many other space simulators released since it came out, and also is run on a very capable graphics engine. As such, a low-end computer can play this game easily.
